name: Angelic Ascension
oracle_text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
flavor_text: Within her battalion she was known as the Angel of Arkvale. Until now, that was only a metaphor.

name: Containment Priest
oracle_text:
Flash
If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
flavor_text: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.

name: Defiant Strike
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."

name: Feat of Resistance
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
flavor_text: Dragons are extinct on Tarkir, but Abzan magic still emulates their endurance.

name: Revitalize
oracle_text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"A potion is no substitute for a skilled surgeon, but it will hold your bits in."
—Torricks, battlefield medic

name: Swift Response
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text:
"There's nothing quite as satisfying as delivering a good kick to the face."
—Adrasteia, Akroan captain

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: "I decide what stands in my way."

name: Capture Sphere
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Discontinuity
oracle_text:
As long as it's your turn, this spell costs {2}{U}{U} less to cast.
End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities on the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

name: Frantic Inventory
oracle_text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Frantic Inventory in your graveyard.
flavor_text: "Another village, another angry mob. Why do I even bother unpacking?"

name: Frost Breath
oracle_text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: "I'll make ice chimes of your bones."

name: Lofty Denial
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you control a creature with flying, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.
flavor_text: The mage scowled as yet another bolt splashed harmlessly against seemingly empty air.

name: Miscast
oracle_text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text:
"Next time, try something more appropriate for your skill level."
—Barrin, Tolarian archmage

name: Opt
oracle_text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The crystal pulsed with the power of Teferi's planeswalker spark. Had Jhoira given him a blessing or a curse?

name: Rain of Revelation
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text: "As the sky opened up, we ran for shelter. Halfway there I came to the sudden realization that, already soaked, there might be more to gain from experiencing the rain than running from it."

name: Rewind
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
flavor_text: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."

name: Rookie Mistake
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and another target creature gets -2/-0.
flavor_text: "Stop locking your knees as you strike! Now stand up and try again."

name: Sublime Epiphany
oracle_text:
Choose one or more —
• Counter target spell.
• Counter target activated or triggered ability.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
• Target player draws a card.

name: Unsubstantiate
oracle_text: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Nicely done, Jace. You always were good at disappearing acts."
—Liliana Vess

name: Alchemist's Gift
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains your choice of deathtouch or lifelink until end of turn. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it. Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Eliminate
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with converted mana cost 3 or less.
flavor_text:
"Cruelty? No. This is necessity."
—Kaervek

name: Finishing Blow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "In this world, it's kill or be killed. I'd rather not be the latter."

name: Grasp of Darkness
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I welcome the use of even the foulest magic if it will rid us of the monstrosities that plague our world."
—Munda, ambush leader

name: Liliana's Standard Bearer
oracle_text:
Flash
When Liliana's Standard Bearer enters the battlefield, draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn.
flavor_text: The purple banner of the House of Vess is a symbol of death wherever it's flown.

name: Masked Blackguard
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
{2}{B}: Masked Blackguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Her footsteps are whispers, her passage a last breath.

name: Thieves' Guild Enforcer
oracle_text:
Flash
Whenever Thieves' Guild Enforcer or another Rogue enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills two cards.
As long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, Thieves' Guild Enforcer gets +2/+1 and has deathtouch.

name: Village Rites
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "You were so eager to take and consume. Yet when asked to give, you refuse?"

name: Burn Bright
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

name: Goblin Wizardry
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin Wizard creature tokens with prowess. (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "Quiet in the library" soon gave way to larger concerns.

name: Scorching Dragonfire
oracle_text: Scorching Dragonfire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: As the blaze raced towards her, Syr Ameril closed her eyes and pictured Castle Ardenvale so her last thoughts would be of home.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The beauty of it is they never see it coming. Ever."
—Razzix, sparkmage

name: Soul Sear
oracle_text: Soul Sear deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. That permanent loses indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text: There was no witty retort, no confident boast to accompany the attack. There was only pain.

name: Sure Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: To survive imminent doom, it sometimes takes a foolhardy soul who acts first and fears later.

name: Thrill of Possibility
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "Right now, in these first moments of creation, it is simultaneously nothing and everything."

name: Unleash Fury
oracle_text: Double the power of target creature until end of turn.
flavor_text: Might doesn't make right, but it does win the fight.

name: Volcanic Geyser
oracle_text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The common folk call it the breaking of the crust or the spilling of fire. Geomancers call it target practice."
—Ryda, geomancer

name: Fungal Rebirth
oracle_text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If a creature died this turn, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"We're all food for something in the end."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Heroic Intervention
oracle_text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Wherever the strong would harm the weak, I will be there."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Invigorating Surge
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on that creature.
flavor_text: For hydras, most problems can be solved with the addition of a few extra heads.

name: Life Goes On
oracle_text: You gain 4 life. If a creature died this turn, you gain 8 life instead.
flavor_text:
"If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!"
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Ranger's Guile
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"You don't survive in the wild by standing in plain sight."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees."
—Emmara

name: Run Afoul
oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"What did you catch today, my pet? Ah, it looks like a bit of vampire stuck between your teeth."
—Atla Palani, nest tender

name: Titanic Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

name: Niambi, Esteemed Speaker
oracle_text:
Flash
When Niambi, Esteemed Speaker enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, you gain life equal to that creature's converted mana cost.
{1}{W}{U}, {T}, Discard a legendary card: Draw two cards.
